mapper.select: select o.buyNumber, o.studentCode as buyerStudentCode, o.buyDate, b.bookName, b.bookSrc, u.userName as buyerName from userOrder o left join book b on o.bookId = b.bookId left join user u on o.studentCode = u.studentCode where b.studentCode = #{studentCode} and orderStatus = #{status, typeHandler = cc.yyf.book.typeHandler.OrderEnumTypeHandler} limit #{from}, #{size};
